title: Sea bass in a coriander and chilli batter served with chips, balsamic samphire and sauce gribiche
description: Traditional fish and chips done the gourmet way. Served with samphire and gribiche - a delicious alternative to tartar sauce.
ingredients: sunflower oil or beef dripping, for deep-fat frying (approximately 1.2 litres/2 pints)
1 sea bass (minimum 900g/2lbs), filleted, skin and pinbones removed, cut into four portions
1kg/2lb 4oz large Maris Piper or King Edward potatoes, peeled
2 free-range eggs, hard-boiled and finely chopped
